subject: Missing parts
description_text: Hi i just received my pedals today every thing seemed okay but while putting together I’ve realised the light bar That goes in front off the pedals is missing I’ve attached pics and my order confirmation [image0.png] [image2.jpeg]

conversations.body_text: Hi，kurtis smith，  您好，请仔细检查包装——LED灯带可能装在了凹槽或槽口里。我期待您的回复。
Hi kurtis smith,  Hello, please double-check the packaging — the LED strip might be placed in a groove or slot. I’ll be waiting for your response.

Hi thankyou for your quick reply if been through the whole box a couple times definitely not in there the seal on the
box was opened but I’m assuming that was just to put the carbon plate in as it was packaged separately,
everything else is in the box and I’m very happy with how they feel just waiting for the led strip before using them

Thankyou
Kurtis smith
Sent from my iPhone

Hi kurtis smith,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We will ship the ProX footrest lighting module separately for you the day after tomorrow (next Monday), and we will provide you with the tracking number once it's sent.

Perfect thankyou very much
Sent from my iPhone

Hi just seeing if the part has been sent if so do you have a tracking number thankyou
Sent from my iPhone
Hi kurtis smith,  Your package has been sent, no logistic update yet, it is expected to be delivered for you on the 25th .

Hi any update on the tracking number?
Sent from my iPhone
Hi kurtis smith,     Here's your logistics tracking link.   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2516800707941049
